author: admin
name: Arti Bachhar
content:
Click here to download PDF file of her experience letter.

Responsibilities
- Prepare voucher for all transactions that take place in Finance sections.
- Make and entry for all petty cash transaction into Quick Books.
- Timely collect the bank statements from the bank.
- Monitor whether all the taxes deducted at source deposited in the revenue account of GON.
- Carryout functions regarding opening of office related as well as staff’s bank account.
- Arrange appropriate the payment schedule of insurance premium, electricity/telephone bills, internet bills, house rent etc. and prepare and submit necessary documentation for making payment.
- Prepare and collecting, compiling and completing hard copy financial reports to be sent to Project Management Unit.
- Carry out all other assignments as directed by Supervisor.
- Prepare VAT claim documentation and submit it
2/5
DESCRIPTION OF DUTIES: Administration
- Keeping records of all employee personal file & leave records, incoming and outgoing letters, documents etc.
- Ensure proper cleaning and maintenance office premises.
- Ensure the log sheet is maintained for the use of generator in the office.
- Ensure that the driver maintains logbook for the use of office vehicles.
- Ensure timely renewal of project vehicles with the transport management office.
DESCRIPTION OF DUTIES: Procurement
- Carryout procurement for Office.
- Prepare periodic purchasing plan and carry out procurement accordingly.
- Maintain Inventory in and out records of all procurement and distributions.
- Update in a regular interval the Inventory list taking yearly reporting requirement to Project into account.
- Maintain asset movement records of all assets moved from one place to another.
- Maintain vehicle maintenance history record
